## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test addition/update

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this on different browsers (if frontend)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments for new functions/classes

### Database Changes
- [ ] I have created necessary database migrations
- [ ] I have updated the DATABASE_SCHEMA.md if schema changed
- [ ] Migrations run successfully

### Security
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have not hardcoded any secrets or credentials
- [ ] I have run `npm audit` and resolved issues

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR includes breaking changes
- [ ] I have documented the breaking changes
- [ ] I have updated the migration guide

Any additional information that reviewers should know.

## Deployment Notes

Any special deployment considerations (environment variables, migrations, etc.)
